channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- ABAP Platform & Server (KRNL32NUC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- ABAP Platform & Server (KRNL32NUC)

item.title: CVE-2019-0270|2024-08-04T17:44:16.340Z -- sap%20se -- abap%20platform%20%26%20server%20%28krnl32nuc%29
item.description: ABAP Server of SAP NetWeaver and ABAP Platform fail to perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. This has been corrected in the following versions: KRNL32NUC 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22, 7.22EXT, KRNL32UC 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22, 7.22EXT, KRNL64NUC 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, 7.74, KRNL64UC 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, 7.73, 7.74, 8.04, KERNEL 7.21, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, 7.73, 7.74, 7.75, 8.04.
